experience: Never celebrate or give up too soon

• Ensure that qualified, technical candidates are presented against resource requirements in a timely and efficient manner • Work in conjunction with resource manager, account executive, site manager, account manager or regional recruiting manager to qualify and clarify details of the assignment • Identify and recruit qualified candidates from all sources, assess their potential qualifications, and determine appropriate action items • Follow ISO certified recruiting process to ensure recruiting and hiring quality • Coordinate technical interviews between candidates and staff.• Negotiate all facets of the hiring process including salary, relocation, travel, and expenses • Develop and implement creative approaches to attracting new candidates including direct sourcing, job posting, Boolean searches, and networking • Create, manage and customize reports used as tools for the analysis of recruiting, sales and hiring processes

•	High volume agency recruitment of Information Technology professionals, from highly technical skills sets (.Net/ Java developers, Application Support, Network & Infrastructure) to fringe IT (Business Analysts, Project Managers) at all levels of seniority•	Experience recruiting on highly competitive oil and gas accounts with 5+ vendors on the same role•	Advanced user of Si Systems’ proprietary ATS and exposure to VMS (Vendor Management Systems) including Beeline and FieldGlass•	Engage in diverse sourcing strategies, including advanced Boolean search strings, Community Broadcasts, referrals and social media •	Experience recruiting and placing on both contract and permanent positions•	Read & scan resumes quickly to extract vital information•	Conduct proactive and reactive recruitment interviews, understanding candidate experience in  more detail, using traditional and non-traditional interview techniques•	Negotiate contract rates and permanent salaries •	Perform reference checks both via email and over the phone•	Edit and improve candidate resumes

•	Assist in international sales of Old Master paintings•	Secure rental agreements with local museums and promote activities tonews outlets, including developing press relations, writing press releases and organizing press conferences•	Responsible for alternative investment opportunities, including summer rental property management

•	Revised and tracked facility management expenses, achieving 10% annual cost savings for the branch•	Reviewed the bank’s Pitchbook, and suggested changes to Marketing campaign•	Uploaded sensitive customer archives for system upgrade

•	Responsible for promoting and organizing international internships for USI students, as well as realizing incoming international students to work in local companies in Lugano. •	Expanded AIESEC to Franklin College, the American university in Lugano.•	Helped turn around Lugano's negative image at USI, growing membership

summary: Changing careers and lives, one call at a time.For over 30 years, Procom Services has been matching people with companies, for jobs that are a perfect fit—contract, full-time, or part-time. We partner with the best companies—large and small—across North America, including some of the best known enterprises in the world, and provide them with a range of services, training, tools, and, most importantly, the ideal candidates, pre-screened and ready to roll.Procom is a leading provider of Information Technology (IT) staffing in North America. With a business model rooted in transparency and flexibility, Procom is committed to the highest standards of excellence in the provision of customized contract/permanent staffing and payroll administration solutions.Specialties: IT Staffing Sales, Transparent Pricing, Client Flexibility, Recruiting, Payroll
